DOC.brief_summary: To study efficacy safety Prepopik™ child age 9 16 year overall colon cleanse preparation colonoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Prepopik™ Children Overall Colon Cleansing Preparation Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 9 year 16 year , inclusive , schedule undergo elective colonoscopy Subjects must 3 spontaneous bowel movement per week 1 month prior colonoscopy Female subject childbearing potential must undergo pregnancy test screen randomization Acute surgical abdominal condition ( e.g. , acute obstruction perforation ) Hospitalized inflammatory bowel disease Any prior colorectal surgery , exclude appendectomy , hemorrhoid surgery , prior endoscopic surgical procedure Colon disease ( history colonic cancer , toxic megacolon , toxic colitis , idiopathic pseudo obstruction , hypomotility syndrome , colon resection ) Ascites Gastrointestinal disorder ( active ulcer , outlet obstruction , retention , gastroparesis , ileus ) Upper gastrointestinal surgery ( gastric resection , gastric banding , gastric bypass ) Significant cardiovascular disease determine investigator If subject history renal insufficiency , serum creatinine potassium must within normal limit Any clinically significant laboratory value screening , include pre exist electrolyte abnormality , base clinical history Hypersensitivity active ingredient
